full_text: Screened by NARA, 4/24/2023 FOIA (b)(6) 14 December 1987 U.S. Immigration and Naturalization Service Arlington, Virginia By hand Re: FOIA (b)(6) Social Security No. FOIA (b)(6) This is to certify that the above referenced gentleman has been engaged as a full-time permanent employee with this corporation since 1 February 1987. His position title is FOIA (b) (6) . His current salary is FOIA (b)(6) In addition he earns a package of benefits relating to his retirement account, to health care for himself and his dependents, to various insurances, and to other matters. I would be happy to answer any questions regarding FOIA (b)(6) employment. I can be reached at this office any time during normal office hours Monday through Friday. Sincerely, FOIA (b)(6) FOIA (b)(6)
